definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: People in Port-au-Prince watch as a French rescue team searches for a survivor.
sentences.chinese: 在太子港人們在看着法國救援隊搜尋一名生還者。

sentences.english: This soldier was the sole survivor of the battle.
sentences.chinese: 這名士兵是這場戰鬥唯一的生還者。

sentences.english: It disgusts me to think that there are still survivors.
sentences.chinese: 光是有生還者這件事就讓人厭惡。

sentences.english: He was the sole passenger in first class to survive.
sentences.chinese: 他是頭等艙乘客中唯一的生還者。

sentences.english: Local ship owners say a few survivors were pulled from the waters.
sentences.chinese: 當地船主說，有一些生還者被救起。

sentences.english: You see this in the faces of tsunami and earthquake survivors on television.
sentences.chinese: 你能從電視上海嘯和地震的生還者的臉上看到這點。

sentences.english: Hasan Nuhanovic was one of the survivors watching from the public gallery.
sentences.chinese: 努哈諾維奇是在旁聽席觀看的生還者之一。

sentences.english: There have been allegations from survivors that safety standards had been lax .
sentences.chinese: 生還者一直指責安全標準執行不嚴。

sentences.english: By midafternoon , the authorities said they had not recovered any survivors.
sentences.chinese: 下午三點左右，政府說他們沒有發現任何生還者。

sentences.english: Go to the woods and see if you can find more survivors.
sentences.chinese: 去樹林裏找找看有沒有更多生還者。

sentences.english: The survivors were stranded on a desolate island.
sentences.chinese: 生還者受困在一個杳無人煙的荒島上。

sentences.english: The baby is the only survival after the serious car accidence .
sentences.chinese: 這名嬰孩是在這場嚴重車禍後唯一生還者。

sentences.english: All the more oxygen for the survivors and those in-the-know.
sentences.chinese: 氧氣是屬於生還者及熟知內情的人。

sentences.english: Your friends are among the survivors.
sentences.chinese: 你的朋友就在生還者之中。

sentences.english: Think of it as Survivor at Johnson Space Center.
sentences.chinese: 將這看做是約翰遜太空中心的生還者。

sentences.english: Survivors lack food and shelter and face the risk of water-borne diseases.
sentences.chinese: 生還者缺乏食物和住所，並面臨着水傳疾病的威脅。

definition: to die in an accident or disaster/to be killed
unfettered and beyond the law (idiom); evading retribution/getting away with it (e.g. crimes)/still at large
to shoot with a gun/shooting incident
to escape (danger)/to rescue/to come out alive
to examine a wound or injury (typically for forensic purposes)
to find/to track down/to recover (sth lost)
to die in the line of duty
